Comments_List: I learned a lot about research and expanded my interests.
I further developed my ability to do research at a semi-grad-student level.
I think the structure of MCDB independent research is great not too complicated so the focus can be on the research itself.
You only take this to do work in a lab. Do it.
If you're interested in biology, I would highly recommend getting involved in research early.
Yes! Absolutely. It is very satisfying to get academic credit for your research and it really pushes you to spend more hours in the lab.
